item.description:
The CT Party Club invites you to The Grand Opening of the Melody Lane Party Room on Wednesday September 2 at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 S Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 at 6:00 pm

Join The CT Party Club for a great night of Music, Food, Fun, and a chance to meet people from across Connecticut.

Enjoy great appetizers and live jazz with hundreds of our Party Clubbers – and have a great time at the Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant. Have a cold drink outside on the patio.

Everyone is invited, and we will be there from 6pm to closing to party in the Melody Lane Party Room.

RSVP’s are not required – just look for the CT Party Club signs.

The Party is provided free of charge to anyone 21 + by our Sponsors: Cherry Street Restaurant, www.EntertainmentCT.com, www.CTPartyClub.com

The CT Party Club is a free social club that holds great events at Restaurants, Night Clubs, Attractions and Events – anyplace FUN and Exciting.

Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... or http://www.Meetup.com... for more info, and join our email newsletter list for our Upcoming Parties

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: FREE EVENT - CT PARTY CLUB -Grand Opening of the Melody Lane Party Room
